RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Brutality
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: If a proposal initiated by this pawn fails, these quirks control the chance of this pawn beating up and forcing the vore on their target.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Bad Listener
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Forget a silver tongue; [PAWN_label] won't take no for an answer.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Coin flip
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] only respects consent half the time. The other half, [PAWN_possessive] prey better get ready for a fight.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: Most of the time [PAWN_label] wouldn't think of fighting to vore any prey that wasn't interested.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Rare
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is even less inclined than most, to use violence for persuasion.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Peaceful
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] wouldn't use violence to coerce [PAWN_possessive] prey if a proposal was turned down.
